reviews.review: Good movie, I remember thinking to myself I'm watching all of my favorite Marvel characters in one movie wow! Best way to describe the movie is it has a Lord of the rings and Empire stikes back feel I'm looking forward to the next installment of Marvel movies that's for sure!
Tremendous movie with plenty of laughs, amazing action sequences, and many breathtaking moments..pure fun!!
Man, I hate it when they put alien actors into movies.
I'm officially broken. Besides this, go watch this movie, it's unlike anything you've seen before. I'm still trying to process what I've seen.
A marvelous masterpiece filled with action and heart wrenching moments that every fan of sci-fi, action flicks, or drama could salivate over!! Can't wait for next year and the sequel!!
This movie was amazing. I really didn't think they we're going to be able to pull off something of this magnitude, but they proved me wrong.

If the goal is to make you wait for the next movie like you wait for a new season of your favorite tv show then this is a 5 Star movie. I hate that about network tv. Do I care about the characters? Am I supposed to have mixed feelings about the villain? I left to a quiet theater who was confused and silent. What did I just watch for 2.5 hours. Nothing resolved, only more questions. Glad it will make a lot of money. Just shocked at the outcome.

100 out of 100 , this movie was well worth the wait , marvel continues to raise the bar every time , fuck  what these critics who didn't like it say , maybe if you actually watched the previous installments you  would understand it better smh . #MarvelAllDayBitch #nuffsaid

Amazing movie for the most part. Infinity war has great fights, music, sad deaths and many. All I will even remotely spoiler related is expect
1.deaths
2.half  a story
3.a Thanos movie
If u don't expect this ur review may be lower, just cause of bringing down expectations, or ruining beloved characters. Thanos is an amazing villain. The infinity stone are awesome and the plot is amazing. This review may change when avengers 4 comes out.
